mapper.select: SELECT q.brd_uni_no ,q.board_nm, q.pubc_yn, q.reg_dt,q.prj_uni_no, p.partici_memb_uni_no, p.brd_yn FROM brd_bm p right JOIN (SELECT * FROM brd a left outer join brd_cm b ON a.brd_uni_no=b.board_uni_no WHERE (a.pubc_yn = 'Y' OR (a.pubc_yn = 'N' and b.partici_memb_uni_no = #{particiMembUniNo})) AND a.prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo}) q ON p.brd_uni_no = q.brd_uni_no
